news_title: Coinbase Makes a Bold Move: $7B in Wrapped Assets Now Ride on Chainlink’s CCIP
news_subtitle: Coinbase has taken a decisive step in its interoperability strategy, announcing that it will exclusively rely on Chainlink’s Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol (CCIP) to bridge all wrapped assets, an ecosystem currently valued at roughly $7 billion. The move is one of the stro...

news_title: SEC Approves On-Chain Transition for U.S. Financial Markets
news_subtitle: SEC Chairman endorses on-chain future, DTCC approved for tokenized stocks custody. Read original article on coincu.com

news_title: Bhutan Debuts Gold-Backed TER Token on Solana Network

news_title: Vitalik Buterin Proposes On-Chain Gas Futures for Ethereum
news_subtitle: Ethereum's Vitalik Buterin proposes on-chain gas futures to stabilize unpredictable fees, impacting ETH and related assets. Read original article on theccpress.com

news_title: Trust Wallet Partners With Revolut for Instant Crypto Purchases in Europe
news_subtitle: Trust Wallet has announced a new partnership with Revolut, allowing users across the European Economic Area (EEA) to purchase cryptocurrencies and have them delivered directly to their self-custodial Trust Wallet, eliminating the need to use centralized exchanges. According to th...

news_title: DTCC Authorized To Launch Tokenization Service For U.S. Securities
news_subtitle: The U.S. securities market is moving closer to large-scale tokenization after The Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation announced a major regulatory milestone. DTCC confirmed that its subsidiary, The Depository Trust Company (DTC), has received a No-Action Letter from the U.S. ...

news_title: Ethereum Gains 2% as ETF Inflows Hit $250M
